display.title: Deepslate Furnace
display.description: A Deepslate Furnace Structure Kit can be made by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, a stack of Deepslate Bricks, Blast Furnace, & Lava Bucket onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 64x Deepslate Bricks 1x Blast Furnace 1x Lava Bucket | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
